backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor with storage mixins, access control, and extensive type definitions for users, games, AI behavior, events, chat, rewards, and parental controls.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a frontend update to VideoHubPage.tsx with related components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files including pages, hooks, games, and components.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application router configuring global providers and routes for all pages and games.
frontend/src/components/AchievementCeleb: Renders confetti or fireworks celebration popups using a queue system and React portals.
Component that checks approval status and shows an approval request UI until access is granted.
Displays animated positive feedback messages using a queue and portal-based notifications.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/GameLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper for games handling navigation, scoring display, sound toggle, and trophy-based pet upgrades.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar managing authentication, page navigation, and admin access display.
frontend/src/components/HomepageFeatures: Displays a grid of feature cards highlighting app modules with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/InstantMiniActiv: Implements age‑based mini‑games with separate logic and state for tapping, matching, or challenge modes.
frontend/src/components/learn-hub/ArtsMu: Defines various arts and music mini‑games and a React component that runs step‑based activities with scoring and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/learn-hub/Discov: Contains discovery-themed fact, mechanics, geography, and invention games and a component that presents steps, quizzes, and story data.
frontend/src/components/learn-hub/Readin: Implements phonics, spelling, vocabulary, and story‑based reading games with progress, scoring, and interactive answer handling.
frontend/src/components/learn-hub/Scienc: Provides weather, space, animals, and plant‑based educational games with quizzes and step progression in a React activity component.
frontend/src/components/MascotGuide.tsx: Floating mascot assistant that shows context tips and optional voice guidance based on the current page.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation form collecting name and age and saving a new user profile via backend mutation.
frontend/src/content/seasonalEventStorie: Exports a dataset of kid‑safe seasonal stories including text and narration scripts for use in read‑along features.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login state handling and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines many TypeScript interfaces and wraps backend canister calls with React Query hooks for fetching and mutating application data.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global styles, color variables, fonts, and Tailwind layers for both light and dark themes with neon accents.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Implements an admin dashboard UI with tabs, user management actions, restrictions, and activity views using data from custom query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ArtGalleryPage.tsx: Provides an artwork gallery page allowing authenticated users to upload images, manage personal art, and view public submissions.
frontend/src/pages/AvatarCreatorPage.tsx: Provides an avatar builder with selectable parts, randomization, and save functionality using user profile and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/CertificatesPage.tsx: Generates customizable achievement certificates on a canvas, manages user inputs, and lists existing certificates.
frontend/src/pages/ChatModule.tsx: Implements a simple contact-based chat UI with preset contacts, emojis, and local message handling.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Implements real-time chat between online users with message polling, online status updates, and message sending.
frontend/src/pages/CraftDIYPage.tsx: Displays craft project lists by category, shows steps and materials, and allows marking projects as completed.
frontend/src/pages/CreativeFunHub.tsx: Renders a hub of creative modules with descriptions and navigation triggers for interactive content.
frontend/src/pages/DanceChallengePage.ts: Interactive dance routine page letting users select routines, play timed pose sequences, and optionally enable a camera feed.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard listing navigable modules with search and admin‑aware visibility handling.
frontend/src/pages/EventCardCreator.tsx: Tool for designing customizable event cards with templates, fonts, stickers, and download/share actions.
frontend/src/pages/EventCardsPage.tsx: Card designer with templates, colors, and a preview, plus a gallery tab for saved cards.
frontend/src/pages/EventsModule.tsx: Event manager allowing users to add and view events with dates, types, icons, and details.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Implements an events page with add/edit functionality and a notification component for today's events.
frontend/src/pages/FeedbackPage.tsx: Provides a feedback submission form with selectable types and displays the user's previously submitted feedback.
frontend/src/pages/FeedbackSystem.tsx: Implements an alternative feedback form collecting type, satisfaction level, title, description, and anonymity.
frontend/src/pages/FunnyFartHub.tsx: Renders a large list of themed fart sound buttons with playback controls and navigation handling.
frontend/src/pages/games/AmbulanceRescue: Top-down rescue game where players move an ambulance to pick up patients under a time limit.
frontend/src/pages/games/BalloonPop.tsx: Balloon popping game using requestAnimationFrame with scoring, effects, and timed gameplay.
frontend/src/pages/games/BibbleAdventure: Platformer where the player jumps across platforms to collect coins while avoiding falling.
frontend/src/pages/games/BirthdayCakeDec: A decoration game where users click a cake to place emoji decorations, track score, and finish to update high scores.
frontend/src/pages/games/BirthdayCakeMak: A step-by-step cake creation game where players select base, flavor, and layers to earn points before finishing the cake.
frontend/src/pages/games/BossesLearnHabi: A boss battle where the boss learns player movement patterns and predicts attacks while the player shoots and dodges.
frontend/src/pages/games/BossFightOnly.t: A canvas-based boss fight with movement, attacks, projectiles, and multi-phase bosses, tracking score and high score.
frontend/src/pages/games/CatGrapplingHoo: A physics-based grappling game where a cat swings to collect food, avoid enemies, and accumulate points.
frontend/src/pages/games/CityMovingPlatf: Canvas platformer with moving rotating platforms, player physics, scoring, and game‑over handling.
Game where the player auto-moves toward a goal while the user controls enemies to block or avoid them across levels.
frontend/src/pages/games/CronkerKontry.t: Incremental resource-building game with buildings, upgrades, achievements, and prestige progression.
frontend/src/pages/games/DelayedControls: Movement game where inputs are delayed via a queue, with obstacles, coins, and a goal.
frontend/src/pages/games/DungeonJanitorS: Top‑down cleaning game where the player collects different debris types, gains points, and avoids losing while debris respawns.
A solo space shooter managing player stats, enemies, projectiles, AI hints, difficulty scaling, and game loop state.
frontend/src/pages/games/EnemiesPlatform: A platformer where flying enemies act as moving platforms, with player physics, enemy movement, collisions, and level progression.
frontend/src/pages/games/EnemyControlsCa: A top-down game where the enemy controls the camera, with player movement, enemy patrol, coin collection, and camera tracking.
frontend/src/pages/games/EscapeRoomUnive: An escape-room game managing themed rooms, item discovery, room unlocking, scoring, and a countdown timer.
frontend/src/pages/games/EverythingBreak: A platformer with breakable platforms, player physics, level-based platform generation, and scoring.
frontend/src/pages/games/EverythingIsBut: Canvas-based game where the player moves and clicks randomly placed buttons that trigger effects, update score, and reveal a goal.
frontend/src/pages/games/FamousPlaces.ts: Multiple‑choice quiz game asking locations of famous landmarks with score tracking and progression through predefined questions.
frontend/src/pages/games/FinalBoss.tsx: Canvas defense game where players place traps to stop advancing heroes from damaging a boss, with waves and scoring.
frontend/src/pages/games/FloorIsLiar.tsx: Platformer where players navigate mislabeled safe and dangerous platforms to reach a goal, with movement physics and level progression.
frontend/src/pages/games/ForestNight.tsx: Top‑down movement game collecting coins in darkness, managing visibility, timer, and score.
frontend/src/pages/games/GadgetCombat.ts: Top‑down gadget combat game managing player movement, enemy pursuit, gadget effects, cooldowns, and score/high‑score state.
frontend/src/pages/games/GlitchWorldEsca: Platformer with glitch‑mode mechanics, handling player physics, platform collisions, level progression, and score tracking via canvas loop.
frontend/src/pages/games/GrandmaSecretAr: Multi‑minigame arcade (whack, catch, memory) with shared state, canvas input handling, and rotating grandma messages.
frontend/src/pages/games/InventoryIsEnem: Canvas action game where inventory weight slows and harms the player while navigating items, enemies, and a goal area.
frontend/src/pages/games/LiesAndTruths.t: Platforming game with randomized true/false hints, safe/unsafe platforms, player movement, and per‑level resets.
frontend/src/pages/games/MemoryMatch.tsx: Implements an emoji-based memory matching game with levels, scoring, card flipping logic, and dynamic grid generation.
Creates a puzzle-room maze where each room has a color, pattern, or sequence puzzle that players solve to progress and score points.
frontend/src/pages/games/MonsterMaze.tsx: Implements a maze navigation game where the player moves through a grid while avoiding moving monsters and trying to reach the exit.
frontend/src/pages/games/MoveWhenBlink.t: A canvas-based stealth game where the player can move only while blinking, avoiding roaming enemies to reach a goal.
frontend/src/pages/games/NumberRunner.ts: A runner game that generates moving math-problem obstacles which players solve by selecting the correct answer while avoiding collisions.
frontend/src/pages/games/OneButtonHero.t: Canvas-based runner where a single button controls jump, dash, and shield, with obstacle spawning and collision logic.
frontend/src/pages/games/OneRoomInfinite: Framework for rotating mini‑games including dodge, collect, memory, and platformer modes with shared state and timers.
frontend/src/pages/games/PacMan.tsx: Grid-based Pac-Man clone managing maze generation, pellets, ghost movement, and directional input.
frontend/src/pages/games/PauseMechanic.t: Top-down coin‑collecting game with hazards and special pause-triggered effects like spawn, rewind, and teleport.
frontend/src/pages/games/PoliceBuddyChas: Lane-based chase game where the player catches criminals while increasing speed and avoiding missed captures.
frontend/src/pages/games/PumpkinSmash.ts: Canvas-based clicking game where moving pumpkins bounce around, can be smashed for points, and the game ends on a timer.
frontend/src/pages/games/ReverseProgress: Platformer where abilities are removed each level, with player movement, enemies, platforms, and ability-based mechanics.
frontend/src/pages/games/ScreenIsEnemy.t: Top‑down coin‑collecting game where random screen effects hinder the player while managing health and movement.
frontend/src/pages/games/ShapeShiftingWo: Movement and collection game where the player switches forms to bypass obstacles and advance levels.
frontend/src/pages/games/SlimeEvolutionA: Arena survival game featuring a slime that evolves into forms with unique effects while avoiding or interacting with spawning enemies.
frontend/src/pages/games/SoundBasedWorld: Canvas-based navigation game where the player moves, emits sound waves, avoids obstacles, and tries to reach a goal while tracking score and game over state.
frontend/src/pages/games/SpaceInvaders.t: A Space Invaders clone with waves, enemies, bullets, movement, lives, and scoring handled via refs and a game loop.
frontend/src/pages/games/SpaceStationLif: Resource-management game where player roles affect income, events occur periodically, and depletion of energy ends the game.
frontend/src/pages/games/SpeedIsHealth.t: Movement-based survival game where player health depends on speed while collecting coins, avoiding obstacles, and staying alive.
frontend/src/pages/games/SpiderWebPuzzle: Puzzle game generating connected web nodes where players disconnect pairs to free all nodes across levels.
frontend/src/pages/games/SuperpowerTrain: Implements a movement-based obstacle game with unlockable powers, collision rules, scoring, and level progression.
frontend/src/pages/games/SuperSpeedyRace: Implements a 3-lane racing game with obstacle spawning, collision detection, lane movement, scoring, and increasing speed.
frontend/src/pages/games/Tetris.tsx: Implements a full Tetris game including board state, piece generation, movement, rotation, line clearing, levels, and score tracking.
frontend/src/pages/games/ThemeParkBuilde: Implements a park-building sim with ride placement, income generation, happiness management, visitors, and game-over logic.
frontend/src/pages/games/TicTacToe.tsx: Implements Tic-Tac-Toe with PvP and AI modes, winner detection, draw logic, and simple AI decision-making.
frontend/src/pages/games/TimeControlAdve: A fast‑paced time‑manipulation action game with enemies, projectiles, coins, and a requestAnimationFrame loop managing spawning and player state.
frontend/src/pages/games/TimeLoopPizzaDe: A canvas-based delivery game where the player delivers pizzas, avoids obstacles, and resets via time loops when the timer expires.
frontend/src/pages/games/TinyHeroGiantWo: A side‑scrolling platformer where a tiny character navigates giant objects, collects coins, and reaches a distant goal.
frontend/src/pages/games/TutorialIsVilla: A comedic tutorial-turned-villain game where misleading instructions spawn traps, fake coins, and hazards as the player moves toward a goal.
frontend/src/pages/games/WordWizard.tsx: A word‑scramble puzzle game where players form words from shuffled letters under a time limit to score points.
frontend/src/pages/games/YoureLateAlways: React canvas-based mini-game with player movement, obstacles, explosions, fires, scoring, and restart logic managed via refs and a game loop.
frontend/src/pages/GamesHub.tsx: Displays a hub of available games with metadata including category, description, icons, and difficulty levels.
frontend/src/pages/GamesModule.tsx: Displays a tabbed game library with filtering, showing cards for predefined games and handling selected game state.
frontend/src/pages/GreenScreenFunPage.ts: Provides a green‑screen photo tool allowing users to upload or capture an image and overlay it onto cartoon scenes.
frontend/src/pages/InteractiveShortsPage: Implements interactive branching stories where users select scenes and make choices that lead to different endings.
frontend/src/pages/JokesGenerator.tsx: Offers a local joke generator with categories, random selection, favorites, search, and share/audio actions.
frontend/src/pages/JokesPage.tsx: Integrates API-based joke browsing, submitting, rating, and favoriting with category filtering and random joke selection.
frontend/src/pages/KaraokeModePage.tsx: Provides a karaoke interface with selectable songs, timed lyric progression, and volume controls.
frontend/src/pages/LearnHubPage.tsx: Displays categorized educational lessons with progress tracking and activity components.
frontend/src/pages/MusicRemixPage.tsx: Allows users to mix audio loops, control playback, visualize audio, and save custom remixes.
frontend/src/pages/ParentalControl.tsx: Offers parental settings for screen time, content filters, chat/video toggles, and user approval management.
Enables users to edit profile details, avatar, and theme, loading and saving data via backend hooks.
frontend/src/pages/RewardsAchievements.t: Static achievements, badges, and challenges are displayed with progress, points, and styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/RewardsPage.tsx: Fetches user reward data and game states to compute badges, scores, and celebrations with interactive UI.
frontend/src/pages/ScaryHub.tsx: Shows a spooky-themed hub of mini‑games with animated effects, sound toggle, and surprise pop‑ups.
frontend/src/pages/SeasonalEventsPage.ts: Displays seasonal activities, decorations, and stories with dynamic themes and completion tracking.
frontend/src/pages/SmartHubPage.tsx: Aggregates all activities and recommends items using user game states and rewards in a navigable hub.
frontend/src/pages/SpinWheelPage.tsx: Implements a spin‑wheel game with cooldown, animations, reward handling, and toast notifications using query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/StickerCreatorPage.ts: Provides a canvas-based drawing tool to create custom stickers with color/brush controls and save functionality.
frontend/src/pages/StoryBuilderPage.tsx: Builds multi-scene story projects by placing characters, props, and text, and saves them to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/VideoGenerator.tsx: UI for selecting templates, characters, and settings to preview or export a simple themed video.
frontend/src/pages/VideoGeneratorPage.ts: Generates animated videos from a story, character, and background by rendering timed frames on a canvas.
frontend/src/pages/VideoHubPage.tsx: Displays categorized kids' YouTube channels with modal previews and navigation support.
frontend/src/pages/VirtualPetHubPage.tsx: Manages a customizable virtual pet hub with naming, accessories, decorations, and save/load via hooks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing values from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining themes, colors, fonts, container settings, and plugin usage for styling.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, feature requests, and requirements for gallery upload behavior and a kids video hub.
